Iron Condor.description: Short-term premium capture strategy using 1-day-to-expiration non-directional condors. Focuses on high theta decay with minimal exposure time.

King Condor.description: Intraday-only condor strategy using same-day expiration (0DTE) for SPX. High potential return with defined risk and tight exit timing.

Trend Spread.description: Directional credit/debit spreads following breakout confirmation and trend continuation setups. Mid-DTE with trailing stop logic.
